history.description: Designed and launched the eight-organ orchestration system coordinating 91 repositories across 8 GitHub organizations. Built recursive-engine (1,254 tests, 85% coverage) — a symbolic operating system translating epistemological frameworks into executable Python. Developed generative art/music systems and AI-conductor workflow.

highlights: Designed and executed digital campaigns increasing donor engagement by 32%.
Rebuilt foundation website — 38% traffic growth, 22% improvement in donation conversions.
Produced multimedia storytelling content driving 28% increase in click-through rates.
Developed social media strategy boosting engagement rates across platforms by 23%.
Architected and deployed video, audio, and visual systems achieving 17.5M+ views and $2M in revenue.
Integrated high-performance SEO and paid media strategies achieving 290% ROI.
Developed and managed client web infrastructure with 42% engagement increase.
Engineered intuitive UI/UX patterns — 26% satisfaction increase, 35% retention improvement.
Designed and delivered 100+ courses to 2,000+ students, applying UX principles to pedagogical architecture.
Translated complex theoretical frameworks into actionable learning protocols with a 92% approval rating.
Optimized student retention by 24% through performance-data-driven instructional iterations.
Led 50 commercial and residential construction projects from concept to completion.
Collaborated with marketing teams on 3D renderings and video walkthroughs.
